checkout.Agreement Message: By purchasing a ticket, you agree to our
checkout.Term1: Venue is strictly 21+. Valid government-issued ID can be required for entry.
checkout.Term2: Face control is enforced. Management reserves the right to deny entry to maintain the venue's atmosphere and dress code.
checkout.Term3: Dress code: Elegant & stylish. We are a luxury lounge and club; please dress accordingly.
checkout.Term4: No refunds will be issued for denied entry due to violation of these terms.
checkout.Term5: Respect the venue, staff, and fellow guests. Any inappropriate behavior may result in removal from the premises.

blog.title: Teatro
blog.subtitle: Headlines
blog.description: Elevating the Music. Our valued partners and sponsors play a pivotal role in bringing our vision to life. We orchestrate an unforgettable music celebration that resonates.

lineup.description: Unleash the rhythm with an extraordinary lineup. Get ready for a musical extravaganza that will captivate your senses.

hall.table_deposit_description: You can use deposit on this table to buy drinks and food during the event. The deposit is non-refundable.

meta.title: Event calendar - Teatro
meta.description: Teatro is a Lounge and Nightclub in Batumi, Georgia. Experience the best of live music, DJ performances, and unforgettable events in a vibrant atmosphere. Join us for an extraordinary nightlife experience!

openGraph.title: Event calendar - Teatro
openGraph.description: Teatro is a Lounge and Nightclub in Batumi, Georgia. Experience the best of live music, DJ performances, and unforgettable events in a vibrant atmosphere. Join us for an extraordinary nightlife experience!

HighlightThree.Vibrant Music Desc: Dance to live DJs and bands playing EDM, hip-hop, and hits.
HighlightThree.VIP Experience Desc: Enjoy exclusive VIP tables and premium services.
HighlightThree.Light Shows Desc: Experience mesmerizing laser and light displays synced with music.
HighlightThree.Craft Cocktails Desc: Savor crafted cocktails and premium spirits at stylish bars.
HighlightThree.Themed Nights Desc: Join unique themed events, from burlesque to masquerade parties.
HighlightThree.Dance Floor Desc: Move freely on our expansive dance floor for self-expression.
HighlightThree.Live Acts Desc: Enjoy captivating performances, from dancers to live acts.
HighlightThree.Guest DJs Desc: Experience special nights with world-renowned guest DJs, events.
